content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1/2 cup white sugar for decoration" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, cream together the butter, 1 1/3 cups sugar, and chai tea mix until light and fluffy.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "cream"@20:25 / AC
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the butter"@35:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "1 1/3 cups sugar"@47:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "chai tea mix"@69:81 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-0 "until light and fluffy"@82:104 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Beat in the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each.
2) Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; blend into the creamed mixture until all of the dry has been absorbed.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Combine"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the flour"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "baking powder"@22:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@41:45 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "blend"@47:52 / AC
		:ppt ( "the creamed mixture"@58:77 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until all of the dry has been absorbed"@78:116 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Cover the dough, and refrigerate for 1 hour.
4) Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-4-0 "the oven"@11:19 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "400 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-4-1 "200 degrees C"@38:51 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Roll the cookie dough into walnut sized balls, and roll the balls in sugar.
6) Place the cookies onto greased cookie sheets about 3 inches apart, and flatten slightly using the tines of a fork.
7) Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, just until the edges begin to brown.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "10 to 12 minutes"@12:28 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-7-0 "the preheated oven"@32:50 / TOOL )
		:until ( cond-7-0 "until the edges begin to brown"@57:87 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:source ( tool-8-0 "cookie sheets"@15:28 / TOOL )
		:prp ( purp-8-0 "to cool on wire racks"@29:50 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)
